text: New Theatre Quarterly (NTQ) is a peer-reviewed academic journal covering theatre studies. It is published by Cambridge University Press. New Theatre Quarterly succeeds Theatre Quarterly (1971–81). Over the years, NTQ has developed a reputation for a "down-to-earth approach" to theatre studies. Its general editors are Maria Shevtsova of Goldsmiths, University of London, and Simon Trussler of Rose Bruford College. Shevtsova replaced Clive Barker, who died in 2005.
